name: Button Clicker (2022)
description:
Welcome, mortal.

To button clicker.

Features (compared to the 2018 version):

  • Made in 20 minutes, from the Ultimate Jumping Simulator 2022 source code. (Compared to the 2018 version, which was made in 1 hour.)
  • Made in Godot, with the GDScript language (Compared to 2018 version, which was made in Unreal Engine 4.)
  • Made With Love!
  • You can actually save your score in this version! Unlike the 2018 version.
  • did i say 2018? i meant 2019.
  • yes i know it says "Start Jumping" in the main menu
